name: PHASENumberMetaParameter
desc: A metaparameter defined by a number that can change over time.

items.name: var minimum: Double
items.desc: The lowest possible number for the value.

items.name: var maximum: Double
items.desc: The highest possible number for the value.

items.name: func fade(value: Double, duration: TimeInterval)
items.desc: Sets the value gradually over the given amount of time.
